page.title: 08TOURISM AND HOUSING
page.content: Although most of the settlement in this area is comprised of individual farms and smallholdings, there has been considerable building in this area in recent years. These new dwellings, conversions and renovations house families who choose to live in a rural area but work in the towns on the coast. Some of the new buildings are used for holidays and weekend breaks, and are owned by people from Merseyside and Manchester. There are also two static caravan sites and a group of holiday cottages for rent which provide accomodation for holiday-makers in the summer.
